Mogul API.

Accounts 

Account related resources of the Mogul API

Accounts Collection 

List all Accounts
GET
/accounts
  • Response  200ShowHide
  • Headers
    Content-Type: application/json
    Body
    [{
"id": 1,
"username": "elephantking24",
"firstName": "George",
"lastName": "Fapgar"
}, {
"id": 2,
"username": "purplejack04",
"firstName": "Lorena",
"lastName": "Blobbit"
}]
Create an Account
POST
/accounts
  • RequestShowHide
  • Headers
    Content-Type: application/json
    Body
    {
    "username": "elephantking24",
    "firstName": "George",
    "lastName": "Fapgar"
}
  • Response  201ShowHide
  • Headers
    Content-Type: application/json
    Body
    {
    "id": 3,
    "username": "elephantking24",
    "firstName": "George",
    "lastName": "Fapgar"
}

Account 

A single Account object with all its details

Retrieve an Account
GET
/accounts/{accountId}
  • Parameters
  • accountId
    number (required) Example: 1

    Numeric id of the Account to perform action with. Has example value.

  • Response  200ShowHide
  • Headers
    Content-Type: application/json
    Body
    {
    "id": 2,
    "username": "elephantking24",
    "firstName": "George",
    "lastName": "Fapgar"
}
Remove an Account
DELETE
/accounts/{accountId}
  • Parameters
  • accountId
    number (required) Example: 1

    Numeric id of the Account to perform action with. Has example value.

  • Response  204

"title": "My Awesome Site"
}, {

"domains": [ 1, 2, 3 ],
"title": "Shopping Emporium"
}]

POST
/sites
  • RequestShowHide
  • Headers
    Content-Type: application/json
    Body
    {
    "name": "My Awesome Site",
    "domains": [1, 2, 3],
    "description": "This site is the epitome of awesomeness."
}
  • Response  201ShowHide
  • Headers
    Content-Type: application/json
    Body
    {
    "id": 3,
    "name": "My Awesome Site",
    "domains": [1, 2, 3],
    "description": "This site is the epitome of awesomeness."
}

GET

    number (required) Example: 1

    Body

"id": 1, "title": "My Awesome Site"

"id": 2, "title": "Shopping Emporium"
}]

Page 

A single page object with all its details

Retrieve a Page
GET
/sites/{siteId}/pages/{pageId}
  • Parameters
  • siteId
    number (required) Example: 1

    Numeric id of the Site to perform action with. Has example value.

    pageId
    number (required) Example: 1

    Numeric id of the Page to perform action with. Has example value.

  • Response  200ShowHide
  • Headers
    Content-Type: application/json
    Body
    { "id": 2, "title": "Shoes Kaboose" }

/sites/{siteId}/pages/{pageId}

  • siteId
    number (required) Example: 1

    Numeric id of the Site to perform action with. Has example value.

    pageId
    number (required) Example: 1

    Numeric id of the Page to perform action with. Has example value.

  • Response  204

Jobs 

Job related resources of the Mogul API

Jobs represent units of work that are requested by the UI or other parts of the system. All jobs are async.

Jobs Collection 

List all Jobs
GET
/jobs
  • Response  200ShowHide
  • Headers
    Content-Type: application/json
    Body
    [{
"id": 1,
"itemId": 1,
"itemTypeId": 1,
"actionId": 1,
"statusId": 1,
"entities":[
    {
    "id": 2,
    "itemId": 2,
    "itemTypeId": 2,
    "actionId": 2,
    "eventDate": "2015-02-28T20:16:12+00:00"
    }
]
}, {
"id": 4,
"itemId": 1,
"itemTypeId": 1,
"actionId": 1,
"statusId": 1,
"entities":[
    {
    "id": 5,
    "itemId": 5,
    "itemTypeId": 2,
    "actionId": 2,
    "eventDate": "2015-02-28T20:16:12+00:00"
    }
]
}]

/jobs

  • Headers

"actionId": 1,

    "itemId": 2,
    "itemTypeId": 2,
    "actionId": 2,
    "eventDate": "2015-02-28T20:16:12+00:00"
    }
]
}

  • Headers
    Content-Type: application/json
    Body
    {
"id": 1,
"itemId": 1,
"itemTypeId": 1,

"statusId": 1,

Insights 

Insights related resources of the Mogul API

Insights are Mogul analytics. The name analytics is just clunky.

Insights Collection 

List all Jobs
GET
/insights
  • Response  200ShowHide
  • Headers
    Content-Type: application/json
    Body

    "id": 1
}]

"id": 1
